remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数返回一个类型为的对象 ，该对象包含对等方的完全限定名称。This constructor returns an object of type that contains the fully qualified name of the peer. 它还指定对等名称是否安全。It also specifies whether the peer name is secured or unsecured. 除了使用指定的分类器和类型创建的对等名称的类型外，此实例还使用当前用户和指定的默认对等标识。This instance uses the default peer identity for the current user and the specified , in addition to the type of peer name to create with the specified classifier and type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Authority As String
public: property System::String ^ Authority { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，该字符串指定此 对象使用的 。

span.span: Returns a string that specifies the used by this object.

value.span: 包含指定 的身份验证部分的字符串。

span.span: The string which contains the authentication portion of the specified .

value.span: 对于安全的对等名称，此属性包含公钥，该公钥是一个长度为 40 个字符的十六进制字符串。

span.span: For secured peer names, this property contains the public key as a forty-character hexadecimal string.

value.span: 对于不安全的对等名称，此属性设置为零 (0)。

span.span: For unsecured peer names, this property is set to zero (0).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有所有者或对等主机可以注册安全的对等名称。Only the owner, or peer host, can register a secured peer name. 如果对等名称由自签名证书支持，则将其视为受保护。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 对等名称区分大小写，对等名称的格式为： *颁发机构. 分类器*。Peer names are case-sensitive and the format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 例如，"MyPeerName" 是一个格式正确的对等名称。For example, "0.MyPeerName" is a well-formed peer name.

para.span: 使用安全的对等名称并不能确保网络应用程序的总体安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 应用程序的安全性是视具体实现而定的。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Classifier As String
public: property System::String ^ Classifier { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 返回一个字符串，其中包含对等 的分类器。

span.span: Returns a string that contains the classifier for a peer-to-peer .

value.span: 包含分类器部分的字符串，该部分用于标识 的对等名称或 PNRP 内的解析。

span.span: The string which contains the classifier portion used to identify a peer name for or resolution within a PNRP .

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则针对所有引用类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 ，针对 类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 0。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等名称的格式为： *颁发机构. 分类器*。The format of a peer name is: *Authority.Classifier*. 对等名称 *分类器* 组件可设置为包含149或更少 Unicode 字符的任何字符串，其中包括 `null` ( "\ 0" ) 终止符。The peer name *Classifier* component can be set to any string that contains 149 or fewer Unicode characters, including the `null` ("\0") terminator. 对等名称字符串区分大小写。Peer name strings are case-sensitive. 对于安全的对等名称，该颁发机构) 的分类器和点 (句点是可选的。For secured peer names, the classifier and the dot (period) after the authority are optional. 对于不安全的对等名称，分类器不是可选的。For unsecured peer names, the classifier is not optional.

summary.span: 用指定的对等主机名称创建指定的 对象的新实例。

span.span: Creates a new instance of the specified object with the specified peer host name.

returns.span: 一个表示指定的对等主机名称的 对象。

span.span: A object that represents the specified peer host name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机是负责启动对等网络会话的 "种子节点"，邀请对等方参与此类型的网络连接对于通讯（如聊天组或游戏会话）最适合的应用程序。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 此方法可用于根据 属性创建对象 。This method can be used to create a object based on the property. 此对等名称未与调用节点的标识相关联。This peer name is not associated with the identity of the calling node.

exception.span: 提供的 不是一个有效的对等主机名称字符串。

span.span: The provided is not a valid peer host name string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果两个对等名称包含和组件中的相同字符，则将其视为相等 。Two peer names are considered equal if they contain identical characters in their and components. 在进行比较之前，不会对字符串执行任何 normalizations。No normalizations are performed on the strings prior to comparison. 在构造对等名称对象的过程中，应完成所有规范化。All normalization should have been completed while or before constructing the peer name objects.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsSecured As Boolean
public: property bool IsSecured { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个布尔值，该值指定这是否是一个安全的对等名称。

span.span: Gets a Boolean value that specifies whether this is a secured peer name.

value.span: 如果为 ，则此对等名称是使用私钥/公钥对进行保护的。

span.span: If , this peer name is secured with a private key/ public key pair.

value.span: 其名称包含该对等计算机的用户证书公钥的安全哈希算法 (SHA) 哈希。

span.span: Its name contains the Secure Hash Algorithm (SHA) hash of the public key of the user certificate of that peer machine.

value.span: 否则，如果为 ，则对等名称没有关联的标识。

span.span: Otherwise, if , the peer name has no associated identity.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则针对所有引用类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 ，针对 类型的属性，该参数的默认值为 0。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types and zero (0) for properties of type .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果对等名称由自签名证书支持，则将其视为受保护。A peer name is considered secured if it is backed by a self-signed certificate. 只有所有者才能使用 PNRP 注册安全的对等名称。Only the owner can register a secured peer name with PNRP.

para.span: 使用安全的对等名称并不能确保网络应用程序的总体安全性。

span.span: Using a secured peer name does not ensure the overall security of the networking application.

para.span: 应用程序的安全性是视具体实现而定的。

span.span: Security of the application is implementation-dependent.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property PeerHostName As String
public: property System::String ^ PeerHostName { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取对等主机的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the peer-to-peer host.

summary.span: 这是 DNS 编码版本的 ，它相当于 ，因为它们都是标识符。

span.span: This is a DNS-encoded version of the which is equivalent to a in that they are both identifiers.

summary.span: 二者之间的不同之处在于可视化表示形式。

span.span: The difference between the two is visual representation.

value.span: 一个表示对等主机名称的 值。

span.span: A value that is the name of the peer-to-peer host.

value.span: 除非显式指定，否则对于引用类型，所有属性的默认值均为 。

span.span: Unless explicitly specified, the default value for all properties is for reference types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对等主机是负责启动对等网络会话的 "种子节点"，邀请对等方参与此类型的网络连接对于通讯（如聊天组或游戏会话）最适合的应用程序。The peer-to-peer host is the "seed node" responsible for initiating the peer-to-peer networking session, inviting peers to participate in applications for which this type of network connectivity is most appropriate for communications such as chat groups or game sessions. 属性指定创建对等网络会话的对等机的名称，该名称被视为会话的主机。The property specifies the name of a peer that created the peer-to-peer networking session, and which is considered the host of the session. 对等网络会话的主机可能会将对等机收集到多个中 。The host of a peer-to-peer networking session may collect peers into more than one . 同时，一个对等方可以同时由多个对等主机托管。Also, a peer may simultaneously be hosted by more than one peer host.
